 Mustex gently rocked the baby(talk about out of character) and 
wondered how this could have happened. Then he saw a small band of 
proto-humans spying him from behind a rock. Perhaps they baby had 
absorbed a bit of one of the childrens D.N.A., or perhaps something 
greater(I'm open to suggestion we can't leave it a mystery forever or 
its no fun). Then suddenly he saw what scared Megaton. The adults 
were 100 times stronger than the babies. This little bot had the same 
energon capacity as any other, just no way to use it. Imagine his 
capacity when he's full grown with many ways to use it. He would be 
unstopable...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  Megaton couldn't believe that weakling had beaten him as he 
climbed 
> into his time machine. If only he had a name he could destroy him 
in 
> their own time. Then it hit him. He had a name. He had heard for 
> years of a transformer trying to destroy him for attacking a 
> defenceless deformed bot, but he thought it was just a joke. Now he 
> could scan that name into a computer and figure out his last known 
> location. He had a name...
> 
>                 MUSTEX
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
